verses.verse: <S%H8085>Listen<s%> to this <S%H1697>word<s%> which I take <S%H5375>up<s%> for a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> over <S%H1004>you,<s%> O house of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

"The <S%H1330>virgin<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H5307>fallen;<s%> She shall <S%H6965>rise<s%> no <S%H3254>more.<s%> She is cast <S%H5203>down<s%> on her <S%H127>land;<s%> there is no one to raise her <S%H6965>up.<s%>"

For thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> "The <S%H5892>city<s%> that went <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> shall have a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H7604>left,<s%> and that which went <S%H3318>forth<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> shall have <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H7604>left<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>"
For thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H1875>"Seek<s%> <S%H2421>me,<s%> and you will live;

but <S%H1875>don't<s%> seek <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> nor <S%H935>enter<s%> into <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and <S%H5674>don't<s%> pass to <S%H884>Beersheba:<s%> for <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%> shall <S%H1540>surely<s%> go into <S%H1540>captivity,<s%> and <S%H1008>Bethel<s%> shall come to <S%H205>nothing.<s%>

<S%H1875>Seek<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and you will <S%H2421>live;<s%> lest he break <S%H6743>out<s%> like <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and it <S%H398>devour,<s%> and there be no one to <S%H3518>quench<s%> it in <S%H1008>Bethel.<s%>
You who <S%H2015>turn<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> to <S%H3939>wormwood,<s%> and cast <S%H3240>down<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> to the <S%H776>earth:<s%>

seek him who <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3598>Pleiades<s%> and <S%H3685>Orion,<s%> and <S%H2015>turns<s%> the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%> into the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and makes the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2821>dark<s%> with <S%H3915>night;<s%> who <S%H7121>calls<s%> for the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and pours them <S%H8210>out<s%> on the <S%H6440>surface<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is his <S%H8034>name,<s%>
who <S%H1082>brings<s%> sudden <S%H7701>destruction<s%> on the <S%H5794>strong,<s%> so that <S%H7701>destruction<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> on the <S%H4013>fortress.<s%>
They <S%H8130>hate<s%> him who <S%H3198>reproves<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and they <S%H8581>abhor<s%> him who <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H8549>blamelessly.<s%>

<S%H3282>Forasmuch<s%> therefore as you <S%H1318>trample<s%> on the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4864>taxes<s%> from him of <S%H1250>wheat:<s%> You have <S%H1129>built<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> of cut <S%H1496>stone,<s%> but you will not <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H5193>them.<s%> You have planted <S%H2531>pleasant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> but you shall not <S%H8354>drink<s%> their <S%H3196>wine.<s%>

For I <S%H3045>know<s%> how <S%H7227>many<s%> your <S%H6588>offenses,<s%> and how <S%H6099>great<s%> are your <S%H2403>sins<s%>â€” you who <S%H6887>afflict<s%> the <S%H6662>just,<s%> who <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H3724>bribe,<s%> and who turn <S%H5186>aside<s%> the <S%H34>needy<s%> in the <S%H8179>courts.<s%>
Therefore a <S%H7919>prudent<s%> person keeps <S%H1826>silent<s%> in such a <S%H6256>time,<s%> for it is an <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H6256>time.<s%>

<S%H1875>Seek<s%> <S%H2896>good,<s%> and not <S%H7451>evil,<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live;<s%> and so <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> will be with <S%H559>you,<s%> as you say.

<S%H8130>Hate<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H3322>establish<s%> <S%H4941>justice<s%> in the <S%H8179>courts.<s%> It may be that <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> will be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph.<s%>"

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H136>Lord:<s%> <S%H4553>"Wailing<s%> will be in all the <S%H7339>broad<s%> <S%H559>ways;<s%> and they will say in all the <S%H2351>streets,<s%> <S%H1930><s%> 'Alas! <S%H1930>Alas!<s%>' and they will <S%H7121>call<s%> the <S%H406>farmer<s%> to <S%H60>mourning,<s%> and those who are <S%H3045>skillful<s%> in <S%H5092>lamentation<s%> to <S%H4553>wailing.<s%>
In all <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> there will be <S%H4553>wailing;<s%> for I will <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> the midst of <S%H559>you,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H1945>"Woe<s%> to you who <S%H183>desire<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh!<s%> <S%H4100>Why<s%> do you long for the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh?<s%> It is <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and not <S%H216>light.<s%>

As if a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> a <S%H738>lion,<s%> and a <S%H1677>bear<s%> <S%H6293>met<s%> <S%H935>him;<s%> Or he went into the <S%H1004>house<s%> and <S%H5564>leaned<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> and a <S%H5175>snake<s%> bit <S%H5391>him.<s%>
<S%H3117>Won't<s%> the day of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> be <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and not <S%H216>light?<s%> Even very <S%H651>dark,<s%> and no brightness in <S%H5051>it?<s%>
I <S%H8130>hate,<s%> I <S%H3988>despise<s%> your <S%H2282>feasts,<s%> and I <S%H7306>can't<s%> stand your solemn <S%H6116>assemblies.<s%>

<S%H5927>Yes,<s%> though you offer me your burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and meal <S%H4503>offerings,<s%> I will not <S%H7521>accept<s%> <S%H5027>them;<s%> neither will I regard the peace <S%H8002>offerings<s%> of your fat <S%H4806>animals.<s%>
Take <S%H5493>away<s%> from me the <S%H1995>noise<s%> of your <S%H7892>songs!<s%> I will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to the <S%H2172>music<s%> of your <S%H5035>harps.<s%>
But let <S%H4941>justice<s%> roll <S%H1556>on<s%> like <S%H4325>rivers,<s%> and <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> like a <S%H386>mighty<s%> <S%H5158>stream.<s%>
"Did you <S%H5066>bring<s%> to me <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> and <S%H4503>offerings<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel?<s%>

You also <S%H5375>carried<s%> the <S%H5522>tent<s%> of your <S%H4428>king<s%> and the <S%H3594>shrine<s%> of your <S%H6754>images,<s%> the <S%H3556>star<s%> of your <S%H430>god,<s%> which you made for <S%H6213>yourselves.<s%>

Therefore will I cause you to go into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> <S%H1973>beyond<s%> <S%H1834>Damascus,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> is the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies.<s%>
